item.title: Report X-2024061326
item.description:
Report X-2024061326

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: ANDERSON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE BROKE OPEN REQUIRING A REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE AEROSOL CAN OF FLAMMABLE SEYMOUR ASA 32 GREEN SPRAY PAINT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IT THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
